docs.abstract: The first debate exchange captured the battle within the Democratic Party over how the presidential nominee should change the country’s health care system.
docs.snippet: The first debate exchange captured the battle within the Democratic Party over how the presidential nominee should change the country’s health care system.
docs.lead_paragraph: The first exchange of the Democratic presidential debate on Tuesday offered a quick and exacting look at the vast ideological divide between the progressive wing of the Democratic Party and the more moderate candidates on the central topic of health care.
